turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place a Bella Luna pickup order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get three medium pizzas with mushrooms, onions and sausage, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and is the standard crust ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, can we make sure that those are thin crust, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll put that request in.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and is this for dine in, pick-up, or delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking to get pickup, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will come out to around 57 dollars.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much. I'm looking forward to it.
